commit.message:
Prep release (#30)

* pdbctl to dev-compose
pdbctl service bridge

* set pdbctl svc bridge cache default to be more reasonable

* linting

* css fixes

* organizationuser meta changes

* Pdbctl integration (#31)

* organizationuser meta changes

* pdbctl integration

* split out logic to retrieve api key from request

* support loading of test data

* clean up

* linting

* linting

* changelog

* settings overview

* use PDB_API_URL as --pdburl parameter default

* docs

* service bridge changes to streamline data views

* more service bridge streamlining

* service bridge data and source of truth joining

* service bridge relationship preloading and management

* linting

* streamline and cleanup source of truth data api

* fix __getattr__

* increase default cache times

* allow disabling of applying permissions to response

* ixctl bridge: integrate mac address and as macro sync

* linting

* dev env setup recipe

* add db start

* add more db docs

* Update develop.md

adding instructions for installing 'poetry' package manager

* fix instructions

* dev env setup

* formatting

* cruft

* typo

* note about centos7

* remove unnecessary mount

* peerctl service bridge integration

* add dockerfile / build

* lock and format

* test without linting

* update compose defaults

* poc: service settings

* add django-structlog, lock

* aaactl service bridge integration and app switcher

* app switcher logo url dynamic

* status badge widget

* add default settings

* format

* add service bridge settings

* refactor settings

* apply logging config

* peerctl ux progress

* fix sessionid, decruft pyproj, lock

* twentyc.rest fixes

* new color theme and peerctl layout

* list sorting refactored to twentyc rest

* theme fixes

* add pk attribute to mimic django object

* lock dal to 3.5.1

* speed formatting no precision, theme fixes

* layout fixes, theme fixes, wizard widget

* comment out devicectl

* add ubi8 builder

* add ixctl_worker, fix sid scope

* service bridge status interface

* service session expires with browser,
logout redirect to aaactl,
require auth auto redirect to oauth process

* fix billing bridge paths

* add app logos

* app logos from fullctl static

* get rid of all workers busy spam

* support email in footer and settings var

* use HTTP_ORIGIN instead

* remove debug message

* fix get_hosts when HTTP_ORIGIN isnt available

* fix tests

* linting

* massage poetry

* lock, bump version

* update container builders

Co-authored-by: Matt Griswold <grizz@20c.com>
Co-authored-by: Ben V <ben@20c.com>
